data.eml:eml: New species of Otiothopinae (Araneae: Palpimanidae) from Colombia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cala-Riquelme, Franklyn, Quijano-Cuervo, Luis, Sabogal-González, Alexander, Agnarsson, Ingi (2018): New species of Otiothopinae (Araneae: Palpimanidae) from Colombia. Zootaxa 4442 (3): 413-426, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4442.3.4
